## Intro

It's assumed that you have followed the previous chapters, so you should be running on nuclear power
and have factories for purple- and military science packs.

TODO Goal etc

## Prepare for yellow science

Start by doing the following research in this order:
- Logistics robots
- Speed module 2
- Productivity module 2
- Automation 3
- Effect transmission
- Utility science pack
- Efficiency module
- Efficiency module 2
- Speed module 3
- Productivity module 3

Make a small blue circuit factory.  
If possible place it near your sulfur factory.  
<details>
  <summary>:abc: Blueprint string</summary>

  ```
  
  ```
</details>

![blue-circuit-factory-tiny](images/blue-circuit-factory-tiny.png)

Make a small Assembling machine 3 factory. This particular design will create 3 items and then stop.
Place Assembling machine 2, green- and red circuits in the input chests.  
<details>
  <summary>:abc: Blueprint string</summary>

  ```
  
  ```
</details>

![simple-assembling-machine-3](images/simple-assembling-machine-3.png)

Add one more red circuit factory.  
Copy-paste your current red circuit factory or use the design in the [previous guide](../chemistry/README.md#red-circuits).

Make a "simple" module factory:  
<details>
  <summary>:abc: Blueprint string</summary>

  ```
  

  ```
</details>

![modules-factory](images/modules-factory.png)
